imageRegistry.description: The image registry for the SaladCloud Virtual Kubelet container that runs on one of your Kubernetes cluster's worker nodes. This is prepended to the `imageName`.

imageName.description: The image name for the SaladCloud Virtual Kubelet container that runs on one of your Kubernetes cluster's worker nodes. This is appended to the `imageRegistry`.

imageTag.description: The image tag for the SaladCloud Virtual Kubelet container that runs on one of your Kubernetes cluster's worker nodes. This defaults to the chart's `appVersion`. This is ignored when `imageDigest` is defined and not empty.

imageDigest.description: The image digest for the SaladCloud Virtual Kubelet container that runs on one of your Kubernetes cluster's worker nodes. This may be used in place of `imageTag` to specify a specific image version.

imagePullPolicy.description: Image pull policy for the virtual-kubelet-saladcloud image

apiKey.description: The SaladCloud API key used by the SaladCloud Virtual Kubelet to manage container group deployments. The API key must be associated with a user account with access to the organization and project (see `salad.organizationName` and `salad.projectName`).

organizationName.description: The SaladCloud organization name used by the SaladCloud Virtual Kubelet to manage container group deployments.

projectName.description: The SaladCloud project name used by the SaladCloud Virtual Kubelet to manage container group deployments.

nodeName.description: The Kubernetes node name used by the SaladCloud Virtual Kubelet.

debug.description: Specifies whether debug logging is enabled in the SaladCloud Virtual Kubelet.
